## Client.getSchema() method

Fetch a schema by ID.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSchema(id: string): Promise<Schema | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Schema](./core.schema.md) \| undefined&gt;

## Remarks

Requires

- the client to be configured with [Options.adminCredentials](./core.options.admincredentials.md)<!-- -->, and

- the Cerbos policy decision point server to be configured with the [admin API](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/api/admin_api.html) enabled.

## Example


```typescript
const schema = await cerbos.getSchema("document.json");
```
